dc_title_s: Plat book of Hillsdale County, Mich.
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 atlas (19 unnumbered pages) | Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners. | Notes: Publication date estimated by similar plat book.|Scale determined from section lines.|Includes advertisements for local businesses.|Lacking last page (Wright Township) and back cover. | Scale approximately 1:51,000
